phrases: Finals are over, and all that is left is the closing ceremony.
She looks better, now that she had a chance to meet Tohru.
I guess it is thanks to Ryu for calling him.
I later learned that Chizu-chan reluctantly had Ryu comfort her.
Oh well, you have an excuse this time.
Sawako even made me personalized study notes.
Do not the review sessions end before Christmas?
Oh, that festivity where couples incessantly show off their love for each other?
There is no school on Christmas Eve.
How about all of us single people get together to do something for Christmas?
We were going to meet up with Ryu and Joe.
Let us trade gifts and eat something good.
It will be a good way to chill out after reviews too.
You are going to bring some chicks too, right?
You are bored this Christmas as well, are not you?
This might be the first and last time I will be able to spend Christmas with you and Chizu.
Who knows, I might not either.
I am part of everyone too.
I will put this up like always.
Write your name down if you are coming.
I can write my name down here.
I think I am doing something for Christmas at home too.
You have not signed up yet?
I have to ask my parents.
Christmas with someone other than family.
I made them as Christmas gifts.
A belly warmer for Dad, slippers for Mom.
First I have to ask if I can go, though.
That would be way too scary.
Besides, even if I knit one, I do not think I could give it to him.
Maybe I can just make one.
Let us try asking if I can go to the Christmas party.
You have not told Santa what you want for Christmas this year, have you?
Better hurry, or you will miss his deadline!
Umm, a notebook and pencil leads.
Santa said he is going to spend a lot this year.
You got to write it down and hang it up.
Sawako's chicken last year was delicious.
Not that I am complaining about your cooking, Mom.
I will help all day, from early in the morning on.
I will leave that to you.
Santa shows up every year, you are such a good girl.
You know, you were supposed to be born on the 24th.
We were worried because your mother did not go into labor.
Look at her now, all big and healthy.
You ended up being born on New Year's Eve,
but to us, you are a Christmas present.
Stop it Dad, you are crying.
You were about to say something.
My dad's really looking forward to it.
Cannot you come just for a little bit?
We start early in the morning and go on all day.
So it is a bit early, but...
I am going to wear it when I help at Ryu's.
Thanks, I am going to use it.
I wonder if he will take it.
Are you sure you should not have given them on Christmas though?
Sawako's dad is really hyped up about Christmas.
We got a reservation for the Christmas party.
Let us do it on a different day next year.
We could do it on the 25th.
Too bad, they invited me too.
I cannot give it to him, but I am sort of proud.
I will hide Mom and Dad's gifts so that I can surprise them.
Thanks for the Christmas present, Sawako.
You remembered I said my head's cold.
I have always wanted something like this.
I am glad you like it.
I was going to give it to you later.
I could not have given it to him anyway.
It is better that someone makes use of it.
I wonder if they are all having fun about now.
I was wondering how you are doing.
It is sort of boring without you.
You are not lonely, are you?
Too bad you could not come, not even for a little bit.
Here is your Christmas present, though.
Nice to speak to you again.
It would be even more fun with Kuronuma-san here.
Dad, can I go for a little bit?
It will be a lot more fun with Kuronuma here.
It is from Santawell, from me.
Y-You could have said so earlier.
I-I will call if it gets late.
This is just the first jab of round one, Dad.
I hope I can make it.
Bet there will be less people next year.
But I still want to go.
Let us go for karaoke next.
The Christmas party and the presents stuff is over already,
I do not even know how to use it yet.
The first name on my first phone is Kazehaya-kun.
Being sad, not making it on time...
Oh yeah, my present for you...
The small miracles, the little mistakes...
It is all a merry Christmas.
and a small taste of regret.
Next episode: The Two of Us
